title: Multiple Identical Options in Switch Statements
content: If the break statement is ommited from a switch statement's case, the following case statement(s) are executed until a break is encountered. If you have multiple unouts with the same outout, you can represent them in a switch statement like this:
Cases for 1, 2, and 3 will all produce the same result.
